InstallationÂ¶

You are on currently on your own here. I am working on a simple git/pip procedure and will update this when appropriate. The system was/is developed on MacOS Monterey (12.6) using python 3.10.8. The external python packages that are required are:

  • numpy 1.23.4_0

  • serial 3.5.0

  • zmq 24.0.1_0

  • astropy 5.1.1_0

Additionally, there is a fake arduino server that uses the socat utility for creating virtual sockets that can mimic the serial port.

  • socat 1.7.4.3_0
